comments:
Build: I-20030925

I opened the launch configuration dialog, and clicked on an existing JUnit 
Plug-in test configuration that I had used to test a project that currently 
does not exist in the workspace.

I got the following error from the Source Lookup tab:
Error Sep 25, 2003 14:53:33.668 Internal Error

Fixed (but can't verify due to bug 43759). This was a non-JRE classpath 
container associated with a non-existant project (I assume it was a "Required 
Plugins" classpath container).

ok, I'll verify it once I fix bug 43759.

What plug-in was affected by the fix?

plug-in "org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui" (not sure if you will need any of 
the "latest" pre-reqs of that plug-in)
This appears to work now (i.e. bug 43759 appears fixed).

traces.message: Launch configuration  org.eclipse.jdt.ui.tests.astrewrite references non-existing project  org.eclipse.jdt.ui.tests.
